comment: By All Means-Stay Safe Mary! You take care of the safe part & we’ll help with the sane part!

# ::snt By All Means-Stay Safe Mary! You take care of the safe part & we’ll help with the sane part!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stay-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mary"))
            :ARG3 (s2 / safe-01
                  :ARG1 p)
            :mod (b / by-all-means))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c / care-03
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / part
                        :ARG0-of (s3 / safe-01)))
            :op2 (h / help-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG2 (p3 / part
                        :mod (s4 / sane)))))
